ygData.messageBody:
What the prev two have said is correct. However,
b/c it (Intelligence) does affect how fast you gain
in SKILLS-- it is important. A bonus when you're
thinking, man, why doesn't my backstab or my dodge go up
faster. Or man, I drink one drink and I'm drunker than a
pig in a poka dot dress. (Don't ask.)<br><br>Int is
important but also-- time you play battling exp mobs raises
your skills anyway. So it's a tough call.<br><br>Also,
I don't know if they mentioned it, hybrid classes
used to drain exp from a group-- now it balances out
to almost be a gain (but not really-- almost extra
exp though).<br><br>Also that Warriors take less exp
to level than other classes. They're designed to die
a lot and deal damage-- tanks and more. So that's
why they get an exp benefit-- the first to die in a
battle gone wrong is often the Warrior.<br><br>Now not
all Warriors feel like that, but when I used to play
a Warrior (gave all my stuff away on the Veeshan
server -- was only level 16 anyway)... I tried my best
to imitate that... but it's hard.<br><br>On thing
that I used to do was the mantra... "I am tank-- if I
yell run... run for zone... no questions
asked."<br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS man I go on and on... apologies
ppl. =)
